## kebabCase variable

Returns the kebab cased form of a string.

Taken from https://github.com/angus-c/just/blob/master/packages/string-kebab-case/index.js kebabCase('the quick brown fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('the-quick-brown-fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('the\_quick\_brown\_fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('theQuickBrownFox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('theQuickBrown Fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('thequickbrownfox'); // 'thequickbrownfox' kebabCase('the - quick \* brown\# fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('theQUICKBrownFox'); // 'the-q-u-i-c-k-brown-fox'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
kebabCase: (str: string) => string
```
